page.title: 10ORGANISATIONS IN CORBRIDGE
page.content: There is a great variety of clubs and societies in Corbridge,catering for all interests.Sporting activities include football,rugby,tennis,cricket, running,badminton,fishing,aerobics and keep-fit.Several organisations raise funds for charity including the Lions Club,Rotary Club and a branch of Cancer Relief.There are branches of the major political parties-Labour, Conservative,Liberal and SDP.There is a Drama Society,Art Club,British Red Cross Society,Friendship Club,Good Neighbours Scheme,Babysitting Circle and Friends of the Samaritans. Gardeners may join the Gardening Society,a Leek Club or Allotment Society.The Village Trust monitors developments in Corbridge.There is a Veterans Club,Royal British Legion branch and Womens Institute.Further Education classes are available.
